source: TEXT_GAIUSC407_00982_SEQ_00<tab>Wedge is gravely concerned for his missing companion.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC407_00982_SEQ_00<tab>ウェッジは冒険者に、人探しをお願いしたいようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC407_00982_SEQ_01<tab>Wedge has implored you to search for Biggs, who is still alone in the cold with the enemy on his trail. Perhaps one of the Ishgardians stationed at Monument Tower has seen something. Begin by asking Abelie.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC407_00982_SEQ_01<tab>ウェッジは、はぐれた相棒ビッグスを探している。秘石の塔の「アベリ」なら何か知っているかもしれない。話を聞いてみよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC407_00982_SEQ_02<tab>While Abelie has not seen Biggs, she suggests that he might have taken refuge within the Fury's Gaze, south of Monument Tower. For want of a better lead, make your way there and investigate.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC407_00982_SEQ_02<tab>アベリは彼の居場所を知らなかったが、身を隠せそうな洞窟の情報を教えてくれた。「ハルオーネの射目」の<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8D5901 /var>を調べてみよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC407_00982_SEQ_03<tab>Your search of the Fury's Gaze yields nothing but a confrontation with vengeful ghosts. Report back to Wedge, who awaits you in Monument Tower.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC407_00982_SEQ_03<tab>残念ながらハルオーネの射目にビッグスはいなかった。秘石の塔に戻り「ウェッジ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC407_00982_SEQ_04<tab>Wedge sinks in disappointment upon hearing your report, but the Lalafell is no less determined to find his companion.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC407_00982_SEQ_04<tab>ビッグスがいなかったことを知ったウェッジは、落ちこんでしまったようだ。いったい、ビッグスはどこに行ってしまったのだろうか……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC407_00982_TODO_01<tab>Go to the Fury's Gaze and investigate.
TEXT_GAIUSC407_00982_WEDGE_000_000<tab>I'm fine now, thanks to you, but I can't bear to think that Biggs is still all alone in the cold, with Garleans on his heels.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC407_00982_WEDGE_000_000)) (( )) 03 /var>、お願いがあるッス！
ビッグスを助けてほしいッス！
……きっと、あいつは今もひとりで逃走中ッス……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC407_00982_WEDGE_000_001<tab>He lured the enemy away for my sake, and now he's suffering for it. I hate to have to rely on you again, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but do you think you could search for Biggs?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC407_00982_WEDGE_000_001あいつは、帝国の飛空艇から脱出するときに、
オイラを助けるために、帝国兵の注意を引いて
別方向へ逃げていったッス……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC407_00982_WEDGE_000_002<tab>I haven't the slightest notion where he might be at the moment, but maybe─just maybe─the people here have seen something.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC407_00982_WEDGE_000_002でも、バラバラに逃げることになったから、
どこに行ったのかまではわからないッス……。
……そこのアベリさんなら、何か見てないッス？

source: TEXT_GAIUSC407_00982_ABELIE_000_010<tab>A Roegadyn gentleman dressed in the same manner as your companion? I'm sorry, but he did not come by here. Hmmm, let me think a moment...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC407_00982_ABELIE_000_010……そちらのお連れの方ですか？
残念ですが、見ておりませんわ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC407_00982_ABELIE_000_011<tab>I would not raise your hopes unduly, but there is a cave situated a short distance to the south. We call it the Fury's Gaze, and it may be worth the while to investigate.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC407_00982_ABELIE_000_011そうね……この「秘石の塔」の近くに、
「ハルオーネの射目」という洞窟があります。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC407_00982_ABELIE_000_012<tab>I make this suggestion only because your friend seems like a selfless sort. Rather than drawing the enemy to this tower, mayhap he elected to pass us by.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC407_00982_ABELIE_000_012あそこなら、身を隠すことができるかもしれません。
もし、こちらの方に逃げているとするならですけど……。
物は試し、行ってみてはいかがかしら？

source: TEXT_GAIUSC407_00982_DUMMY_000_020<tab>//: Examine spot at the Fury's Gaze, ghosts pop.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC407_00982_DUMMY_000_020（ハルオーネの射目の指定地点にアクセス、
　ゴーストが３体ＰＯＰ）

source: TEXT_GAIUSC407_00982_WEDGE_000_030<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Were you able to learn anything!?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC407_00982_WEDGE_000_030ど、どうだったッス！？
ビッグスは見つかったッス！？

source: TEXT_GAIUSC407_00982_WEDGE_000_031<tab>...Not in this area? Well, that stands to reason, I suppose, seeing as he was trying to lure the Garleans <var 1A 02 /var>away<var 1A 01 /var> from me. But where within this vast sea of snow and ice could he be?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC407_00982_WEDGE_000_031……ダメだったッス……？
きっと、こっちの方には逃げてきてないッス……。
……ビッグス、いったいどこに行ったッス……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC407_00982_POP_MESSAGE_000<tab>You feel a chill run down your spine!
